text: 8.23 2 Ko 5.2-4, Gal 5.5, Epe 1.14, 4.30 Pen tap anɨb okok nep mɨŋel gek añɨŋ ma pogup. Mel. Chɨn abe mɨŋel gek añɨŋ pogɨpun. Chɨn God Kawnan ne ak dɨpun. God tap teplep kuŋay yɨbɨl chɨnop ñɨnɨm agɨl, Kawnan ne tap ned ak chɨnop ñub. Pen ñɨn akal tek chɨnop pɨsnep dek mubwak chɨn koŋɨm amɨl, ñapay ne yonɨgabun agɨl, lum awl mɨŋel gek añɨŋ pogɨlɨg kod mɨdobun.
